question.questionText: How does a damaged bulb compare to an open switch?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: A damaged bulb and an open switch both create a gap and cause bulbs to go out
both a damaged bulb and an open switch cause bulbs to go out
a damaged bulb and an open switch create a gap
there is a gap in the circuit
the damaged bulb has the same effect as the switch
